meanings.definition: The state or quality of being skinny.
meanings.sent1: Her skinninesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The model's skinninesses were admired in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: Despite her skinninesses, she could outeat anyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: The skinninesses of the tree branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The skinninesses of the pencil made it easy to hold.

meanings.definition: Thinness or leanness of body or flesh.
meanings.sent1: The skinninesses of the cat made it agile and quick.
meanings.sent2: His skinninesses were a result of his active lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The skinninesses of the rope made it easy to tie knots.
meanings.sent4: The skinninesses of the thread made it perfect for delicate sewing.
meanings.sent5: The skinninesses of the blade made it ideal for precise cutting.

meanings.definition: Lack of fat or excess flesh.
meanings.sent1: The skinninesses of the meat indicated its low fat content.
meanings.sent2: Her skinninesses were a result of her healthy diet.
meanings.sent3: The skinninesses of the wallet showed it was empty.
meanings.sent4: The skinninesses of the bookshelf made it easy to move.
meanings.sent5: The skinninesses of the fabric allowed for a snug fit.
